holidays.title: Day of Ashakalia
holidays.description: Let us dive deep into the importance of the history of the Ashakali people.

holidays.title: International Angelman Day
holidays.description: Knowledge is power, so find out how to spread awareness about Angelman Syndrome.

holidays.title: International Childhood Cancer Day
holidays.description: Learn more about cancer’s effect on children and how you can help.

holidays.title: Liberation Day Afghanistan
holidays.description: Let’s dive into the historical war in commemoration of Afghanistan’s freedom from the Soviet Union.

holidays.title: Love Reset Day
holidays.description: You are invited on a journey of love that needs to start from within.

holidays.title: Lui-Ngai-Ni
holidays.description: Lui-Ngai-Ni is the seed-sowing festival, bringing together the many tribes in the state.

holidays.title: National Black Girl Magic Day
holidays.description: This day hopes to bring change and create an equal future for every Black woman.

holidays.title: National Flag of Canada Day
holidays.description: National Flag of Canada Day is here and we can’t wait to raise the celebrations.

holidays.title: National Gumdrop Day
holidays.description: Grab your gumdrops and let’s get this party started!

holidays.title: National I Want Butterscotch Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate one of the most delicious confections; bring out your butterscotch recipes.

holidays.title: National Marcus Day
holidays.description: Get ready to honor one of the most historic names in the world!

holidays.title: National Wisconsin Day
holidays.description: Come and join us as we learn more about the Badger State!

holidays.title: Parinirvana Day (Nirvana Day)
holidays.description: Parinirvana Day’s activities are for everyone, whether you are a Buddhist or not.

holidays.title: Remember the Maine Day
holidays.description: You may have heard the phrase “Remember the Maine;” we’re here to tell you about it.

holidays.title: Singles Awareness Day
holidays.description: Hallmark may not agree but celebrate your independence, moxie and unique style today!

holidays.title: Sovereignty Day of Serbia
holidays.description: Join us right here as we celebrate Sovereignty Day of Serbia this February!

holidays.title: St. Skeletor's Day
holidays.description: The antithesis of Valentine’s Day is here, and it’s time for the singles to not mingle!

holidays.title: Susan B Anthony Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the birthday of a famous American suffragist and civil rights leader.

holidays.title: Total Defense Day
holidays.description: It takes the whole village — nay, the whole nation — to keep itself strong and together.

holidays.title: World Anthropology Day
holidays.description: Learn more about how anthropology explains the factors that influence human lives.

holidays.title: World Cholangiocarcinoma Day
holidays.description: Let’s learn more about one of the rarest and most aggressive types of cancer — cholangiocarcinoma.

holidays.title: World Hippo Day
holidays.description: Let’s get ready to celebrate our 'river horse,' the world’s third-largest land mammal.

holidays.title: Jane Seymour’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jane Seymour continues to show her undeniable talent and dominance in Hollywood.

holidays.title: Megan Thee Stallion’s Birthday
holidays.description: With this talented rapper’s music, it’s ‘Hot Girl Summer’ all year long!

holidays.title: Susan B. Anthony’s Birthday
holidays.description: This crusader, one of the most significant women in American history, championed numerous causes.
